chunk:
Honest Beauty Honestly Bright Eyes Tinted Eye Cream, Sandstone

Brand: Honest Beauty

Category: Around Eye Cream

Ingredients: Water (Aqua/Eau), Propanediol, Squalane, Glycerin, Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Jojoba Esters, Sodium PCA, Tocopherol, Sodium Acetylated H
book: 0742-Honest Beauty Honestly Bright Eyes Tinted Eye Cream, Sandstone

chunk:
Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Tin Oxide, Mica (CI 77019), Titianium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)

Directions: : Apply a small amount under each eye. Gently dab onto skin as you would apply concealer.
